frontmatter.title: OpenShift Commons Gathering on Automotive
frontmatter.lead_text: This OpenShift Commons Gathering on Automotive will be held on April 6th in Central European Summer Time (CEST)
frontmatter.info_text: This OpenShift Commons Gathering will be held live and broadcast live around the globe. As always, our focus is on creating a welcoming and inclusive space for peer-to-peer interactions online. At this OpenShift Commons Gathering, we'll hear from those end users, partners and OSS project leads from across the Automotive sector as well as Red Hat engineers and project leads collaborating on emerging Automotive initatives. Get connected with your Automotive industry peers across the Cloud Native and OpenShift ecosystems who are passionate about implementing their workloads on OpenShift and other emerging Red Hat technologies.
frontmatter.event_footer_text: All times specified are Central European Summer Time

schedule.session_name: Welcome to the Commons: Unlock the Potential of Collaboration
Keynote: Overview to Red Hat Industry Strategy, Automotive Initiatives, and Vision for Software Defined Vehicle
Eclipse Software Defined Vehicle: Building the Future of Automotive Together
Life on the Edge - Ongoing, Optimized Data Orchestration for Continual Improvement of the EV Experience
Safer Driver: Human Driver Perception Platform That Prevents Accidents, Before They Happen
CyberSecurity and Data Management for Connected Vehicles
Development and Testing Autonomous Vehicles at Scale
Driving the Software Defined Vehicle with eSync and Openshift
What’s Next for Automotive Cloud Natives on the Edge
Automotive AMA Session: Live Q/A with Guest Speakers,Red Hat Engineers & Project Leads
